title: Polish, Swedish envoys meet Khar to discuss intâ€™l donor conference on Ukraine
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 28 (APP): Ambassador of Poland Maciej Pisarski and Ambassador of Sweden Henrik Persson met State Minister for Foreign Affairs Hina Rabbani Khar here on Thursday to discuss holding of International Donors Conference for Ukraine.
Hina Khar said Pakistan remained committed to providing humanitarian relief to civilians in all conflicts.
She mentioned that the government had dispatched two aircraft carrying emergency supplies last month to contribute towards addressing the humanitarian situation in Ukraine.
